comment: We know that being , & positive in every can help us achieve a lot . But this state of is not something that you can get , when negativity is so ingrained in our & our efficient is on mode & driving us at it's own
amr:
# ::snt We know that being , & positive in every can help us achieve a lot . But this state of is not something that you can get , when negativity is so ingrained in our & our efficient is on mode & driving us at it's own
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (k / know-01
            :ARG0 (w / we)
            :ARG1 (p / possible-01
                  :ARG1 (h / help-01
                        :ARG0 (a / and
                              :op1 (b / be-located-at-91
                                    :ARG2 (e / every))
                              :op2 (b2 / be-located-at-91
                                    :ARG2 e))
                        :ARG1 (a2 / achieve-01
                              :ARG0 w
                              :ARG1 (l / lot))
                        :ARG2 w)))
      :snt2 (c / contrast-01
            :ARG2 (p2 / possible-01
                  :polarity -
                  :ARG1 (g / get-01
                        :ARG0 (y / you)
                        :ARG1 (s / state
                              :mod (t / this)
                              :mod (s2 / something)))
                  :time (a3 / and
                        :op1 (ii / ingrained-02
                              :ARG1 (n / negative-03)
                              :ARG2 (m2 / mode
                                    :poss (a4 / and
                                          :op1 (w2 / we)
                                          :op2 (e2 / efficient-01
                                                :ARG1 w2))
                                    :degree (s3 / so)))
                        :op2 (d / drive-02
                              :ARG0 n
                              :ARG1 w2
                              :ARG2 m2)))))

comment: Let you don't allow your mind to dwell on things that steal your peace , joy & energy , instead think about blessed & bright . Instead of scrolling aimlessly on phone all the time , think more about the things you want in & fill your mind with happy .
amr:
# ::snt Let you don't allow your mind to dwell on things that steal your peace , joy & energy , instead think about blessed & bright . Instead of scrolling aimlessly on phone all the time , think more about the things you want in & fill your mind with happy .
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (l / let-01
            :mode imperative
            :ARG0 (y / you)
            :ARG1 (a / allow-01
                  :polarity -
                  :ARG0 y
                  :ARG1 (d / dwell-01
                        :ARG0 (m2 / mind
                              :poss y)
                        :ARG1 (t / thing
                              :ARG0-of (s / steal-01
                                    :ARG1 (a2 / and
                                          :op1 (p / peace)
                                          :op2 (j / joy)
                                          :op3 (e / energy)
                                          :poss y))))))
      :snt2 (ii / instead-of-91
            :ARG1 (t2 / think-01
                  :ARG0 (y2 / you)
                  :ARG2 (a3 / and
                        :op1 (p2 / person
                              :ARG1-of (b / bless-01))
                        :op2 (p3 / person
                              :ARG1-of (b2 / bright-02)))
                  :ARG1-of (ii2 / instead-of-91
                        :ARG2 (s2 / scroll-01
                              :ARG0 y2
                              :medium (p4 / phone)
                              :manner (a4 / aim-02
                                    :polarity -)
                              :time (t3 / time
                                    :mod (a5 / all)))))
            :ARG2 (a6 / and
                  :op1 (t4 / think-01
                        :ARG0 y2
                        :ARG2 (t5 / thing
                              :ARG1-of (w / want-01
                                    :ARG0 y2))
                        :mod (m3 / more))
                  :op2 (f / fill-01
                        :ARG0 y2
                        :ARG1 (m4 / mind
                              :poss y2)
                        :ARG2 (h / happy-01)))))
